content: The word of the  that came to Micah of Moresheth in the days of Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, which he saw concerning Samaria and Jerusalem.
Hear, you peoples, all of you;
and let the Lord  be a witness against you,
For behold, the  is coming out of his place,
And the mountains will melt under him,
All this is for the transgression of Jacob
What is the transgression of Jacob?
And what is the high place of Judah?
Therefore I will make Samaria a heap in the open country,
and I will pour down her stones into the valley
All her carved images shall be beaten to pieces,
for from the fee of a prostitute she gathered them,
